```{r}
# importing packages and data
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
dataset <- read_csv("C:/CS_programs/Python/code/LLM_connectives/LLM_Logic/LLM_Logic-2/data/contradiction_task_updated_responses.csv")
```

```{r}
dataset <- dataset %>%
  group_by(Condition, Type) %>% # change to Type
  mutate(Correct = Contradictory_cont == Response) %>%
  count(Correct) %>%
  mutate(Percentage = n / sum(n)) %>%
  filter(Correct == TRUE)
view(dataset)
```

```{r}
# plotting
ggplot(dataset, aes(x = Condition, y = Percentage, fill = Type)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
  labs(title = "Proportion of Correct Responses by Type and Condition",
       x = "Condition",
       y = "Proportion of Correct Responses") +
  theme_minimal()
```
